1554828532_1PZnbAYUg4AzDgJU4gtTupekoaNp1.body:
>How does a site publish to ZeroHello

ZeroHello is the homepage of a ZeroNet instance, if an instance has visited a certain ZeroNet site it'll automatically appear on there.

>What do you need to recreate the "Follow" button.

You can take a look at this Zite's dbschema.json (search for "feeds")

http://127.0.0.1:43110/raw/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/dbschema.json

>Is there a way to have my sites inherit the same style?

Take a look at https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroBlog/commit/c45a90cd240364d5811846ad64f82f7c61024634#diff-5d64c896876ffb297ab1e13cfed711d8

Thanks krixano, couldn't find the docs for it. Here's the ZeroNet link for the documentation:

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DocsYf2tZVVMEMJFHiDsppmFicZCWkVv1/site_development/zeroframe_api_reference/#feedfollow
